description: Sicilian-born Giuseppe (Joe) Vitale is bringing his Italian heritage, Brooklyn background, and passion for crafting delicious and authentic pizza to the streets of LA. His selection of pies is made with optimum care and quality; the crust is perfectly crunchy and thin, the sauce is tangy and flavorful, the mozzarella is amazingly tasty, and the toppings are top-notch. It’s no wonder all the locals are sincerely delighted by each bite of every “slice of NY”. For a most delicious taste of the East Coast on the West Coast, you just have to go eat at Joe’s Pizza Truck.
name: Joe's Pizza Truck
